{{ja-kanjitab|お|ろ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Note that the reading of the first character does not correspond to the reading used in the {{etyl|cmn|-}} term {{m|zh|惡露|tr=èlù||lochia}}. The reading ''o'' corresponds to ''wù'' in {{etyl|cmn|-}} and means "to hate", and the reading ''aku'' corresponds to ''è'' in {{etyl|cmn|-}} and means "bad".
